amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to submit a report to Congress on the use of Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy (HBOT) within the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 111-233 to require the Secretary of Defense to submit a report to Congress on the use of Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy (HBOT) within the Department of Defense.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
